attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HELP ME TO CLAIM TO THE SALVATION ARMY MY INDEMNIFICATION AFTER 11 YEARS OF HARD WORK, I AM TABARE JUSCAMAYTA AND I LIVE IN ARGENTINA BUENOS AIRES, SOUTHAMERICA,
           WITH RESPECT, T,J.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
